page.title: 19INDUSTRY
page.content: {Justin Harlock age:9 The{Dunlop}is the largest factory in{ {Holbrooks.}It makes car wheels and air suspensions for trucks/buses,aircraft tyres,wheels and brakes.2500 people work for{Dunlop.}Protective clothing is needed in some parts.The factory covers 100 acres,some parts are 100 years old.The company have their own security and fire fighting forces.The {Dunlop Company}bought the factory site in 1908 from{Stephenson Wheel Company. {Courtaulds by Sharon Williamson age 11 {and Patricia Merrett age 10 We wrote to Courtaulds chemical works Little Heath.They make Acetyl Acetone and Acetic acid.555 people work there. The number of ladies is 62.The factory is fairly large although some areas are no longer in use.Personnel get Â£2.55 an hour and work from 8.30am_ 5pm.Staff are paid on qualifications.
